channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Jira
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Jira

item.title: CVE-2019-3402|2024-08-04T19:12:09.400Z -- atlassian -- jira
item.description: The ConfigurePortalPages.jspa resource in Jira before version 7.13.3 and from version 8.0.0 before version 8.1.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the searchOwnerUserName parameter.

item.title: CVE-2019-3401|2024-08-04T19:12:09.256Z -- atlassian -- jira
item.description: The ManageFilters.jspa resource in Jira before version 7.13.3 and from version 8.0.0 before version 8.1.1 allows remote attackers to enumerate usernames via an incorrect authorisation check.

item.title: CVE-2019-3399|2024-08-04T19:12:09.513Z -- atlassian -- jira
item.description: The BrowseProjects.jspa resource in Jira before version 7.13.2, and from version 8.0.0 before version 8.0.2 allows remote attackers to see information for archived projects through a missing authorisation check.

item.title: CVE-2019-3403|2024-08-04T19:12:09.377Z -- atlassian -- jira
item.description: The /rest/api/2/user/picker rest resource in Jira before version 7.13.3, from version 8.0.0 before version 8.0.4, and from version 8.1.0 before version 8.1.1 allows remote attackers to enumerate usernames via an incorrect authorisation check.

item.title: CVE-2019-3400|2024-08-04T19:12:09.257Z -- atlassian -- jira
item.description: The labels gadget in Jira before version 7.13.2, and from version 8.0.0 before version 8.0.2 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript via a cross site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the jql parameter.
